In England, in the seven days to 11 February, there were 335,982 new confirmed cases (594.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 February, there were 493,968 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (157,986 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 February is 15,727,107 (27,810.9 cases per 100,000 population).
